title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
created_time: August 28, 2023, 03:21:25 PMLast edit: August 28, 2023, 05:24:43 PM by jeremypwr
content: UFC Fight Night 226Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 3 mbtc Free Bet2nd place: 2 mbtc Free Bet3rd place: 1 mbtc Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-fight-night-gane-vs-spivac/matchesMatches(2 points each)12. Ciryl Gane vs. Sergey Spivak(must get 12 correct to proceed)11. Manon Fiorot vs. Rose Namajunas10. Volkan Oezdemir vs. Bogdan Guskov9. Benoit Saint Denis vs. Thiago Moises8. William Gomis vs. Lucas Almeida7. Yanis Ghemmouri vs. Caolan Loughran(1 point each)6. Morgan Charriere vs. Manolo Zecchini5. Ange Loosa vs. Rhys McKee4. Taylor Lapilus vs. Muin Gafurov3. Nora Cornolle vs. Joselyne Edwards2. Farid Basharat vs. Kleydson Rodrigues1. Zarah Fairn dos Santos vs. Jacqueline CavalcantiNOT go the Full Distance   Make sure your Prediction is in this format    Example12. Ciryl Gane 11. Manon Fiorot 10. Volkan Oezdemir 9. Benoit Saint Denis 8. William Gomis 7. Yanis Ghemmouri 6. Morgan Charriere 5. Ange Loosa 4. Taylor Lapilus 3. Nora Cornolle 2. Farid Basharat 1. Zarah Fairn dos SantosNOT go the Full Distance 10

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.
